name: sccccmanagement
description: Management utilities for SCCCC written in GAS

scripts.git:enforce-clean: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "\nERROR: Git working directory is not clean. Commit or stash your changes before proceeding.\n" && git status --short && exit 1)
scripts.clasp:create-version: npm run git:enforce-clean && npx @google/clasp version "Version $(git describe --tags --always) - Git: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.dev:versions: npm run set-dev-env && echo "Git Tag: $(git describe --tags --always)" && echo "Git Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && echo "\n--- GAS Versions ---" && npx @google/clasp versions
scripts.dev:create-version: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp version "Dev Version $(git describe --tags --always) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.dev:deploy: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_DEV_TEST_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" && echo "\nDevelopment deployment updated to latest code. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_DEV_TEST_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
scripts.stage:redeploy: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npx @google/clasp versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Staging"
scripts.stage:deploy: npm run stage:push && npm run clasp:create-version && npm run stage:redeploy && echo "\nStaging deployment updated to latest code and versioned with Git. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
scripts.prod:versions: npm run set-prod-env && echo "Git Tag: $(git describe --tags --always)" && echo "Git Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && echo "\n--- GAS Versions ---" && npx @google/clasp versions
scripts.prod:redeploy-live: npm run set-prod-env  && npx @google/clasp deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npx @google/clasp versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Production $(git describe --tags --always)"
scripts.prod:deploy-live: npm run prod:push && npm run clasp:create-version && npm run prod:redeploy-live && echo "\nProduction deployment updated to $(git describe --tags --always) - GAS Version: $(npx @google/clasp versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}') - Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
